name: Space Tour (gruppo20vr)
description:
This APP lets you discover the inside of the international space station and achieve different goals by doing activities to survive. You will have to face dangerous situations and resolve them as fast as you can as long to survive the experience. You will also learn and discover new things about the station, the space and how astronauts live.

 Challenge yourself like a real astronaut would do it. 

APP controls :

Horizontal Movement :  W, A, S, D

Vertical Movement: Q, E

Object Interaction: F, L

Show In-Menu: TAB

Show Pause Menu: ESC

Project developed by the students of the course "Realtà Virtuale" at  Politecnico di Torino (course 22/23). 

Gruppo 20

Baratta Luca

Carpegna Francesco

Cielo Fabio

Pamplona María

Sgarzi  Federico
